divs: Sighting Detailsme my girlfriend her little sister her mom and the driver which was male were riding around about midnight on gynesynder freeway, when we went over a overpass at stonestreet rd. were there is a very large opening and a few houses around. we came upon a huge round disk shaped object, which was hovering there in the opeaning with no sound and it was about 2 stories thick with a huge dome on top with tinted windows going around it. it also was above a house but i never went to talk to them cause i dont want to be told to get away. anyway we all seen it and my girlfriends little sister was only 13 or 14 and nobody talks about it, its like it never happend but it did. this is the first time ive told anyone like you'll and its really messed my whole life up. by the way we were right beside the ufo, i didnt notice much but the windows cause i was looking for beings through them but they were to dark andright now i only live a few hundred yards from the sight.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around January 5th 2002
Summary: Me and 4 other people were driving down freeway and drove beside it.
